text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ardan, Yaeno! Did you try the traditional 
candy that I made? What did you think?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
It was very delicious! To the point that 
I almost want you to be the Mejiro's 
private supplier……♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? I-I'm sure it wasn't that good… Y-You don't think so, right, Yaeno?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…My apologies. 
I haven't tried it, so I cannot say.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, is that so! Umm, was there something 
that you didn't like about it……?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
…No, that is not it. 
…It is just………

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, indeed. The decorative 
squirrel was very adorable♪

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text:
How could I eat Mr. Acorn while he's looking 
at me with such…… cute, round eyes……!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Y-You even gave him a name……!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, both of you! 
Really, it's such an… honor…! 
I'll try making something you can 
keep around longer next time!
